entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 14.

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
